description: Schemas in #/definitions detect or validate keys, objects or constraints variously applicable to Bodies and/or Targets (Section 3.2.1 - 3.2.6). Excludes Choice, Set and Specific Resources.
title: Definitions: Bodies and Targets.

$eref.description: True when the object is an External Web Resource, i.e., includes an id that is of format uri but does not contain source (Specific Resource) keys (Sections 3.2.1, 3.2.4, 4).
$eref.title: Definition: External Web Resource

$eref.description: True when the object is an Embedded Textual Body, i.e., includes the value key (Section 3.2.4).
$eref.title: Definition: Embedded Textual Body

_88singleLanguagePropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of language being singular (if/when) used on External Web Resources, Specific Resources, Textual Body Resources (Sections 3.2.1-6, 3.3)
_88singleLanguagePropertyFound.title: Collate: language key with qualifying body/target classes

_88languageValueCheck.description: True when string value starts with a two or three lc characters and a hyphen or end of string (Section 3.2.1)
_88languageValueCheck.title: Definitions: language value regex

$eref.description: True when the Body or Target has no processingLanguage or exactly one processingLanguage property (Section 3.2.1)
$eref.title: Validation: processingLanguage

$eref.description: True when object has exactly 1 source value and at least one of purpose, selector, state, styleClass, renderedVia, scope (Section 4)
$eref.title: Detection: Specific Resource

$eref.description: True when the object is an External Web Resource, i.e., includes an id that is of format uri but does not contain source (Specific Resource) keys (Sections 3.2.1, 3.2.4, 4).
$eref.title: Definition: External Web Resource

$eref.description: True when the object is an Embedded Textual Body, i.e., includes the value key (Section 3.2.4).

_88processingLanguagePropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of processingLanguage (if/when) used on External Web Resources, Specific Resources, Textual Body Resources (Sections 3.2.1-6, 3.3)
_88processingLanguagePropertyFound.title: Collate: processingLanguage Key with qualifying body/target classes
